snippet: Ina Drew is one of four former officials of the bank who are to lose the equivalent of two years of compensation because of their involvement in the trading fiasco that has cost the bank at least $5.8 billion.
abstract: Ina Drew is one of four former officials of the bank who are to lose the equivalent of two years of compensation because of their involvement in the trading fiasco that has cost the bank at least $5.8 billion.

headline.main: Trading Loss at JPMorgan Will Result in Millions in Pay Givebacks
headline.print_headline: Trading Loss at JPMorgan Will Result in Millions in Pay Givebacks
